questions.question: What is Runner's knee characterized by?
options: Pain behind or around the kneecap
questions.correct_answer: Pain behind or around the kneecap

questions.question: What causes a sprained ankle?
options: Twisting, rolling, or turning of the foot beyond normal motions
questions.correct_answer: Twisting, rolling, or turning of the foot beyond normal motions

questions.question: What is the function of the menisci in the knee?
options: To provide stability to the ankle
To act as a cushion between the shin bone and thigh bone
To help lift and rotate the arm
questions.correct_answer: To act as a cushion between the shin bone and thigh bone

questions.question: What is the rotator cuff?
options: A tendon that attaches the humerus to the shoulder blade
questions.correct_answer: A tendon that attaches the humerus to the shoulder blade

questions.question: What is a common cause of a rotator cuff tear?
options: Planting the foot firmly on the ground

questions.question: Where is the ACL located?
options: Diagonally in the middle of the knee
questions.correct_answer: Diagonally in the middle of the knee

questions.question: What is a common cause of an ACL tear?
options: Changing direction with foot firmly planted
questions.correct_answer: Changing direction with foot firmly planted

questions.question: What is a symptom of a meniscus tear?
options: Pain when lying on the affected shoulder
Stiffness and swelling in the knee
questions.correct_answer: Stiffness and swelling in the knee

questions.question: What is a symptom of a sprained ankle?
options: Catching or locking of the knee
Loss of full range of motion in the knee

questions.question: What happens to the ACL in a complete tear?
options: It stretches beyond its normal range
